pages.text: Falling from a high place is unfortunately a common fate you might be met with on your daily travels. To circumvent the odd cliff ending your next journey prematurely, employ the $(item)Light Heart Aspect$(). Should the ill-fated situation arise, it will block all fall damage, given that it was in fact enough to break the aspect.
Do consider however, that breaking a $(thing)Light Aspect$() comes with a hefty cooldown of 60 whole seconds, even if no fall damage was blocked.
